sn45.16:1.2: “Atthime, bhikkhave, dhamma parisuddha pariyodata anangana vigatupakkilesa anuppanna uppajjanti, nannatra tathagatassa patubhava arahato sammasambuddhassa.
sn45.16:1.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, attha dhamma parisuddha pariyodata anangana vigatupakkilesa anuppanna uppajjanti, nannatra tathagatassa patubhava arahato sammasambuddhassa”ti.
